website_summaries.verdict: Earned rave reviews from those who just want to go a few shades lighter.
pros: If your goal isn't platinum blonde, you can use 20 developer and leave this on for as little as 30 minutes
cons: Some complain hair felt brittle after use

customer_reviews.title: I researched many other options......BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would've taken before and after pictures. Bleached my daughter's hair with 30 volume developer on top of coconut oil....toned it with Wella's Ash Blonde toner. She is practically the Mother of Dragons now (which was our goal). I was slightly concerned about how damaged her hair would be afterwards but I'm thinking the coconut oil (pre-bleach) mask helped minimize the dryness. I rarely read 5 star reviews but I hope someone reads mine. This was good stuff! I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bleach after seeing a lot of YouTubers using it and decided to give it a shot. It worked great! I have very dark brown hair and it lifted my hair instantly. I followed it with wella T18 toner for a platinum look. I’m very happy with my results and will keep buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: G.Luk

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I have dark brown hair and this works wonders at turning my hair blonde...no orange no brassy color no more purchasing purple shampoos!! Yayyyy I use loreal developer 30
customer_reviews.author: ChristiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT TOUCH THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: Omg I cannot stress this experience enough! I have been bleaching my roots for awhile and never had any problems until I decided I will try this powder! I have mixed it with 30 vl developer and since the description on this powder says “on and off scalp application I applied it my roots. Ten minutes later I felt incredible itching and burning. I felt it was not normal and when I rinsed off I saw my raw skin. It gave me severe burns and I was left with red hair roots since I couldn’t keep it any longer. I never had any allergic reaction with any bleaching products until I tried this! So be very careful!
customer_reviews.author: Almusha

customer_reviews.title: Love this product !
customer_reviews.text: I used a 20 volume with this bleach powder to dye my asian-black hair. It gave me copper hair after the first bleach, golden hair after the second bleach, and finally blonde hair after the third bleach. I have short hair so that makes it easy to bleach my own hair evenly. I will buy a 30 volume to see how things will go, but this product is wonderful. Just in case if you're wondering, I waited one to three months in between dyes so that my root looks brown-ish while the overall color is blonde (hence the picture). I personally love that. I just hate a drastic contract of blonde and black hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use. Follow directions!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bleach powder with a 30vol developer and Olaplex to achieve this level of blonde in about 45 mins. The products works great and didn't leave too much brassiness and after sporting blonde for few months I used Arctic Fox hair dye to get my mermaid hair. My only complaint is the size of the bucket definitely mislead me on the amount of powder I had purchased. I was able to do 2 full heads of shoulder length hair BARELY which is still amazing for the price. I was just surprised when I opened the bucket and the plastic bag containing the bleach powder was less than half the size of the bucket. Would def purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kim rosario

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pic 1) My natural hair color, brown/black. Pic 2) I left this product plus 20 developer cream for 30 minutes and it came out yellowish. Pic 3) Left in for 45 minutes and it came out to the shade I wanted it. Sorry for the poor lighting. Pic 4) Developer cream 20 plus the bleach in action. This stuff doesn’t drip, doesn’t burn, sorta itches, mainly in one spot but nothing crazy that I can’t stand and I love it! I’m not a professional, just a DIY’er.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Nicole

customer_reviews.title: huge tub with 16 oz bag powdered bleach
customer_reviews.text: i was shocked when i saw how big the tub was, so i was actually relieved when i opened it up to find a smaller bag containing the powdered bleach inside. WHEW! seriously, who needs a giant tub like that?? it is professional salon quality. it came in a bag in the tub, so nothing leaked out during shipping. i would definitely purchase again IF i ever run out. ***just a heads, up: this is powdered bleach,*** and you will need to buy cream developer separately (ya know, 20, 30 or 40 volume).
customer_reviews.author: R+E Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Works for non professionals
customer_reviews.text: Did it's job. Since I'm not a professional it was difficult for me to bleach my virgin black hair. However, I made sure not to bleach back to back to back. Wait a few weeks in between bleaching and don't leave it in too long. Took me about 3 or 4 bleaching sessions to get my hair super light before toning and adding on colors. I used 30 volume developer and towards the end only 20 volume. Toned with wella t28 and added on a temporary gray dye.
customer_reviews.author: NZV

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I was bleaching my hair and my roommate swung around... "what are you doing?" "Im bleaching my hair." "WUT?,..... there's no SMELL" True. It hardly smells at all and feels very gently on the scalp. It rinses smooth and clean too. Overall excellent and does what it says. I had med/dark brown hair and after 25 minutes it was all lifted and I was left with a very soft pale yellowish tone and ready to color :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie WilcoxTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used 20 vol developer with it, (I normally use 30 for my darker brown natural hair color((see my eye brown color for reference))) but since this was my first time using this product I used a lighter volume. Works great! I needed to leave mine on longer I think to get the orange tint off. All in all, it doesn't stink for birn your nose from smelling. My scalp started to have some small burning but only in scabs.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lest

customer_reviews.title: Cockroaches!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item lifted the lid only to find cockroach pieces in it, beyond disgusting. Item looks previously used the bag is tied shut. I’m not sure why this item was offered in such condition.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I dye my hair a LOT (probably every 2 months minimum), and for brighter colors I will bleach before dying. I have used a lot of different bleaches and none of them could lift my natural dark brown hair that much, and on top of that damaged my hair a lot. This did MINIMAL damage (used with a 40 volume L'Oreal developer), and lightened it to a golden blonde in one use! I wish I had known about this stuff back when I was trying to go platinum blonde!
customer_reviews.author: Janeeta

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. What a waste of a spending! I’ve been coloring my own hair for over 20 years now and because with the current virus restrictions and all I’ve decided to try this product and what better way to get it than from amazon prime...🙄. It says lifts up to 7 shades but it’s terrible. Left my hair with orange-y color and dry as God knows what, worst part is that you CAN NOT RETURN THIS PRODUCT. JUST TERRIBLE!!🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: alvin r. morris

customer_reviews.title: Yes it will work on a black beard.
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s for head hair, but tried it on beard. Definitely works. Wanted a grey / silver beard just for kicks before I shaved it off. But my beard is super dark brown, pretty much black. Had to bleach before i dye it. Combined it with a vol 40 developer (and yeah, I know vol 30 is technically the limit on skin contact per the instructions, but you can probably handle it). Before and after pics speak for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, low damage if used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bleach, every time. I've been using this bleach for years. It doesn't do much damage to my hair. Just. Follow. Directions! I've noticed in a lot of YouTube videos people just do their own thing... stop! You need to do research and read directions thoroughly. You also need to make sure you're mixing it with the right volume developer for what look you're going for. Developer is purchased separately. And the consistency of the bleach/developer mix is also very important. Keep that in mind. Anyways... great product. Won't ever touch anything else. I've been bleaching my hair for years using this.
customer_reviews.author: Annet

customer_reviews.title: put it on my hair and it did a wonderful lift, very minimal uncomfortable warmth
customer_reviews.text: I was scared buying this, but I wanted to bleach my hair without the heft pricetag (Insane I know all hair dressers everywhere are reading this and gasping) So I buy this, no idea what to do with it, but the instructions are incredibly clear, I mixed it up, put it on my hair and it did a wonderful lift, very minimal uncomfortable warmth, great lift. There was obvious damage to my hair but not much, as much as I had expected from going from an almost black to level 1 blonde. I highly recommend, this is a great bleaching product, the instructions are very simple and there is enough for many applications and retouches
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Correct amount in the tub. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Powder comes in a bag that is inside the container. It is the correct weight, I was concerned so I put it on a scale and it's roughly in the right ballpark. I didn't bother to weigh the bag itself and subtract it from the total since I didn't want to make a mess. As for its use, that will vary person to person. I use it with 40 volume creme developer since I have thicker darker hair, and it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well and doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying a box of manic panic bleach every time I needed to bleach my hair, so I vetted a few different brands for rating and cost and ended up purchasing this. I used this with 30 Vol Developer in a 3 scoops of developer to 1 scoop of bleach ratio using the scoop inside the bleach. It worked very well, turning my dyed ginger hair to a yellow-white with the ends a slight orange tone after one session, all I needed to do for the color I was dying it was tone it with some purple toner and I was good to go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre C

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: First time I brought this it worked great and did what it was suppose to do, but the second time I purchased this product it smelled off but I decided that it was just my nose acting up and applied it anyways but the moment it touch my skin and hair (accidently landed on my shoulder while bleaching my hair) it was burning it off. I had to wash it off immediately so buyer beware. Also note that I do not have damaged hair, my hair is very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving packaging, half a container full
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t too happy to find out that the bleach that came in the container wasnt the size of the container.. more like half the size.. but they dont lie about the quantity, it is definitely a pound of bleach, just thought it was going to be more like the size of the container. but hey it works and it will definitely last me awhile
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DIY hightlights
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional hair stylist but love to highlight hair (mine and others in my family). This product is great! I have platinum highlights. I usually use 40 vol. developer but it's a little damaging. I've recently started using 20 and it worked fine on virgin hair (in foil). I would suggest using a purple shampoo (like Clairol shimmer lights or Schwarzkopf) after highlighting your hair (if you don't like to tone your hair/base like me). Results are great and look professional.
customer_reviews.author: noosh

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying, does the job
customer_reviews.text: This bleach is very potent, make sure you know what you're doing and take precautions because it does have the potential of frying off your hair. I have dark brown hair (almost black) and using this with 30 developer took 3 rounds to get to a pale yellow. Thank goodness my hair is quite resilient and stayed on my head. The only thing is that the packaging is unnecessarily large when the container is only filled to about 1/4 with the actual powder. Overall, it is worth it for the price and I would buy again if I am once again looking for a cheap alternative to the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Very small portion inside large tub
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed in the small amount of powder inside the large tub. Why is the tub so large...just to fool customers??☹
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this with a strong developer to get my nearly black brown hair to white blond in order to dye it funky colors for over 10 years now. The only downside is that sometimes it can stain your hair a purpley shade the same color as the powder, but that's usually only if its left in the hair for longer than needed, or if used over already white hair.
customer_reviews.author: T Patistas

customer_reviews.title: Good for jet black Asian hair
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best bleach powder I've had for my hair. I have jet black Asian hair so it's not always easy to bleach. This stuff gets the job done and I don't have to use a lot of it. It does come in a huge container compared to the bag inside which throws me off a bit, but overall product workds great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had the worst experience with this product. I've used it before and never had any issues. This one didnt lift evenlying or as much as it should. I had to bleach my hair twice to fix its mistakes and even then it didnt work as it should've. My hair didnt turn out even close to how I wanted. I am very disappointed. I know I can't return this item but I believe I deserve some sort of compensation.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hall

customer_reviews.title: You'll look like a smurf goddess
customer_reviews.text: Works quickly, but follow up with some coconut oil or your favorite deep conditioning treatment! Don't be afraid to bleach in multiple sessions, yes your hair looks weird for a while but it also hates you less. That said, I'm a hypocrite and went from dyed dark auburn to medium blonde in about twenty minutes. Make sure to T O N E with purple dye diluted with any conditioner, or actual purple shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Mairéad Swyney

customer_reviews.title: Works well in dark hair!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I was looking for! I used t with 30 vol L’Oréal Oreor developer and it worked wonders. I have never been able to lighten my dark brown and processed hair past a medium brown. This took my hair to a light caramel and blonde. It is lower in odor than other products I have used and works very fast!
customer_reviews.author: amazonloverfromtn

customer_reviews.title: Gets my hair very platinum blonde, I am HOOKED!
customer_reviews.text: The color lasts for about 3-4 weeks, I also use a 50 stabilized cream peroxide developer. Much better than Manic Panic. I plan on buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: ElenaMarie Burns

customer_reviews.title: it's like magic!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other Loreal products before using this to bleach my hair. I have a straight thick black hair. I will always have bronze look after bleaching with other products but this one gave me platinum blonde to white hair! I have already loss hope until I found this. I could have saved money if I use this before trying other products. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brent and Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Bucket is way bigger than amount of powder you get.
customer_reviews.text: Bucket it big but the actual bag of powder on inside doesn't even take up 1/2 the bucket. Kind of seems like they are trying to trick to into thinking you are getting a lot. Also a waste of plastic when they could've used a way smaller container. Other than That, it works and can get a decent amount of applications from it.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Evans

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NOT ORIGINAL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst thing ever! It’s so thick no matter how much developer I used! I’ve bleached my hair with this brand millions of times but this special one from amazon was horrible. It made my hair orange and it barley lifted anything. Which never happens to me. I left it on for 35mins and it didn’t lift. Not sure if I got a bad product but I am so disappointed & I can’t even return it to get my money back. This is nothing like the original formula I’ve bought from Sally’s!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got disappointed with the result. I tried this for high light result my hair is level 6, buy my blonde turned orange as cheap looked. I colored two times my hair strands two times with almost 20 minutes. I didn’t like it so I had to color my hair again to level 6 to cover up that ugly orange.
customer_reviews.author: Senay

customer_reviews.title: My go-to bleach
customer_reviews.text: I love this bleach. It is so valuable for the price and the amount you get with this tub. I personally dye my own hair and a few of my friends and I use this bleach EVERY time. It is cheap, easy to use, and overall great quality. I like the blue in it because it takes out most of the brass and orange tones in my Asian hair. I use this with pretty much any developer that I can get my hands on, but they recommend L'Oreal developers with this product. If you want a good starter bleach for yourself, this is the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Always a great outcome.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased Quick Blue for 10+ years and I’ve never had issues with performance or quality. This product always works well, lifts on tone, doesn’t irritate the scalp, and is just a great value for the price. I typically stay with 20v developer to maintain hairs integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie McClure

customer_reviews.title: With proper use, this can take out a lot of colour from DARK asian hair!
customer_reviews.text: Had my friend help me mix this with some 40 developer and it brought out a lot of the colour from my dark asian hair! I went from black to a bright yellow (not like a daisy yellow, but still more yellow than blonde) with only a single process. I could probably use this to go blonde, but I wanted a cobalt blue, so I cancelled out the yellow with purple and the blue dye took very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Imel

customer_reviews.title: Love it lightens smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Best bleach on earth.. Lightens my black hair really nice. I have to bleach it 3 times bc my hair is so black and i used a 40 vol developer ....saturate your hair w olive oil first before u bleach..and for a toner I recommended u have a salon do it God bless
customer_reviews.author: Andria vazquez

customer_reviews.title: V little product inside. But works on 4C hair and eyebrows too.
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect the bleach to be so little. I plan on bleaching multiple times and on my hair pieces too, so I needed a good amount of bleach and was disappointed to find so little of it. In terms of the product itself, I have used this product before and it works pretty well for 4C hair, you just need to make sure to keep moisturizing and take good care of your hair afterwards like any other hair. My roommate has also used it to bleach her eyebrows and it worked well with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mwagíra

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I have dark brown hair and this product works great. I lighten to do pastels with no issue. I used the same product as recommended by a friend before I got a job that didn't allow me to color fantasy colors. This time I bought on Amazon instead of Sally's, and the product was real and works just as well as always! They have me hooked for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Irritated
customer_reviews.text: So I'm giving it 1 star because they didn't not give me the full amount of I literally received half the weight of what I purchased it is not a pound but I paid for a pound so no im not giving any more then 1 star sorry I paid for a pound not half a pound
customer_reviews.author: Alessa

customer_reviews.title: great product! definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.text: did maybe 10 bleaches (touch ups, streaks, full) with this and it all turned out great! the blue tint of the bleach definitely helps with lessening the brassy colour in bleached hair. super cheap especially since the one use bleach in the stores are $10 ._.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Salim

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best bleach powder I've used. I don't get the heat/burning feeling on my head even after wrapping. It lightens my hair super fast, I use a lot less and it's less damaging to my hair than other brands. Used with l'oreal 30 vol cream developer.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for highlighting dark hair
customer_reviews.text: If you want a powder that might end hair this is the one for you. I have tried so many lighenters and this is one of the top ones that gets my blonde the lightest. I still use a toner as with every lightener but this is good stuff! I have naturally brown hair.
customer_reviews.author: JBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Gd I purchase this before it work perfectly fine so I order again 2 bleach hair because it did a perfect job before when I apply it 2 the hair it wasn't change coloure mayb they ave it long but it didn't bleach my clients hair at all expired good
customer_reviews.author: sherika mair

customer_reviews.title: Can possibly explode
customer_reviews.text: The bleach puffed up and was extremely hot while I was mixing the developer with it! Not sure why it did this and I have bleached a lot of hair in the past and never seen this !
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: I feel duped
customer_reviews.text: The tub makes it seem like theres a lot more in it. the baggie inside took up less than 1/3 of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Dark brown hair to blonde with minimum brass
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bleach. I have very dark brown mousy hair and with one use, there was very little brassiness in my hair (and it lifted it to a medium blonde color). Make sure you leave about an inch and a half away from your roots at first so you don't get hot roots; the roots lift much faster than the rest of the hair because of the heat from your scalp. Then within that last 15-20 minutes margin, add the rest of the bleach to your roots. Also try your best to keep everything well saturated - this will ensure an even color and minimum brass! Very pleased with this product and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT use the product !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m beyond pissed I’ve been bleaching and dying my hair for the last 6 years I used this product and I can’t believe how disappointed I am. I used 30 volume developer like I have since I started dying my hair I normally leave it in for 50 minutes to an hour but I decided because it was new bleach that I should do less time I ONLY left it in for 20 minutes and every hair that the bleach touched is falling out and breaking off over half of my hair is gone. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR HAIR
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dark hair! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love quick blue! I always use it to bleach my very black hair to blonde and it works super well every time. I used quick blue with 20 vol. developer and left it in my hair for 45 minutes for light blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: ITS WORTH BUYING!
customer_reviews.text: First time purchasing a BUCKET! Overall was pretty satisfied. The Bucket Arrived wrapped in plastic, and the bleach powder inside was twist tied in a bag. Only filled up about half of the bucket though.. for the price, would have preferred it to be nearly full.
customer_reviews.author: R@CH@3L M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BLEACH!! My hair shade is a 4RV, I did a tester piece just in case it turned out way to orange. The results are AMAZING! (Still have to bleach it once more for the blonde level, I want) I used 20Vol also added a couple of drops of Rose Oil and Castor Oil. I bought both of them on AMAZON as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it doesn’t have that strong nose piercing smell like the BW2! It still has a small order, but not as strong. It works good. I’d buy it again if ever needed more. I used mines to dye the lace on my wigs. It got the job done, but it didn’t bleach all my knots before if start dying the roots. Overall it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joeenea L.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with a different brand of scalp bleach burning my scalp so decided to give this a try...and WOW...so creamy and easy to apply.....and NO burning at all...turned out amazing. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Less than what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, but the amount they gave me is less than what I paid for
customer_reviews.author: Deborah LF

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: besides being expensive, I really liked it. I have black hair and by this I could of dying my hair without damaging my hair, but if used it on dying hair it would caused a series damage. Moreover, it really dry your hair so you have to use a lot of oil and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: t.aliakbari

customer_reviews.title: Loved this powder
customer_reviews.text: Loved this powder, it was perfect for my girls hair. We were worried as both have very sensitive skin, but with this bleach there was very little irritation even when going directly on the scalp. The lift was perfect with the 40 cool creme and there was hardly any noticable dryness of the hair after.
customer_reviews.author: David Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Half-empty like a bag of chips.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it comes half-empty. I get that "product settles" but I think there was some sort of mix-up because there was clearly room for two seperate bags in this gigantic tub but only shipped with one.
customer_reviews.author: Saturniidae

customer_reviews.title: will buy again !!
customer_reviews.text: for some reason i though the tub would be filled to the top, but it does make sense for it not to be ... besides my misunderstanding of the size, this product is amazing !! i have naturally really dark hair then i dyed it black with box dye and though i did have to bleach it twice, it came out perfect and took the color super well !!
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, either missing content or low quality distributer
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, except my powder arrived in a plastic bag and I didn't get the plastic tub it should be in. I'm not sure if this was a packing error of if this is how it's normally shipped. I can imagine the powder being in a bag inside the tub to prevent spills but the tub being missing was frustrating. Luckily I already had one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff its where its at. I used to just buy the 2 small packets of this.. Gave in an got me this. Bc of how good it works. An how much i like it. Worth it. I wouldnt recommend useing 30 or 40 developer. U will fry it off. I used 20 just took a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie vanover

customer_reviews.title: You can bleach at home easily!
customer_reviews.text: After years of salon bleaching, hours at the salon, and then applying color I love this product! So easy to mix and use for amateurs! I do all coloring at home now! Bleach it and then apply silver color!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I use it with Schwarzkopf Igora Royal 9% 30 Vol. Colorist's Color & Care Developer, and Manic Panic AMPLIFIED Virgin Snow White Toner, my hair is a dark blond and this gets it to a nice bright white! Just be very careful not to over bleach!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: which is nice, but on the other hand
customer_reviews.text: The formula is a bit more gentle that I'm used to, which is nice, but on the other hand, it takes a LOT longer to lift, even using 40% developer. I am fairly nervous about leaving bleach on my hair for more than 20 minutes or so (I had a bad experience), but it does eventually get the job done even if it takes a bit longer. I have almost black hair, and while I haven't attempted to get it pale blonde, it does lift enough for me to color my hair with cellophane or vegetable dyes in unnatural colors. My hair does feel a lot less damaged than it usually does after bleaching, too, which is pretty amazing.
customer_reviews.author: psychopompous

customer_reviews.title: That it works for me
customer_reviews.text: Package was a little beat up but the bleach was good thank u have a bless day
customer_reviews.author: Maryzayas

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use if you are careful enough about it. This bleach and another brand developer has been much easier on my hair than the box bleach kit I used to use.
customer_reviews.author: Erin I.

customer_reviews.title: 😑really
customer_reviews.text: Just look at how much u get compared to the container. Now Idk if that equals up to the correct oz or not but they didn’t have to fool me with this big container.
customer_reviews.author: Audrianna mickayla

customer_reviews.title: I'll be coloring my hair again in a week to lighten it again for a better shade of blonde
customer_reviews.text: I paired the bleach with the Ion Sensitive Scalp developer 20 Volume. I had really dark hair and left it in for about an hour. Works well for the first phase of bleaching turned my hair dark blonde with some orangey yellow tones. I'll be coloring my hair again in a week to lighten it again for a better shade of blonde.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a review. This helped bleach my dark brown hair to light blonde in prep for a bold color. It worked well. It did not fry my hair. YAY.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: Best best best value
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with my purchase it amazes me how ripped off I get at the hair store even with my beauty card . No more hair store for me ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent I guess
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this bleach at all. Simple as that. Been using bleach for a couple years now and this one gave me the most problems as far as lightening
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive right product
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive the L'Oreal Quick Blue Powder Bleach, 16 oz. Instead we received Barbicide!!! Which is an Anti-Rust liquid! Like no where close to hair bleach!
customer_reviews.author: DebsRN89

customer_reviews.title: Delivery took FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: I had redish pink hair and I had to bleach my hair 3-4 separate times and my hair was pale pink and I used manic panic electric lizard over it and it came out amazing and neon
customer_reviews.author: PickleRick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have used this product before and its great. Everyone I know has recommended this to use. I thought it was a small container, turned out to be huge. Definitely should last me awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Use with 40 vol developer and toner!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap for the amount of bleach, worked amazing with my loreal 40 volume developer. If planning to have blonde hair, get a toner girl! Will turn yellow or orange without a toner.
customer_reviews.author: poopoo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s better and a bigger container than I thought. I’m extremely satisfied and recommended this to my friends and daughter already.
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lift
customer_reviews.text: This bleach is it! It lightened my hair from bright red to nearly platinum blonde when used with a 30 vol. developer within 30 mins. I was amazed that my hair was barely orange. If you are trying to get that perfect platinum blonde, this product will get you there quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Alden Chang

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: There is a consensus among buyers that the bag is smaller than the container. This is true. The bag that is in the container is half the container. However, it works great. Not a lot of smell and there was enough to do my friends hair and mine 2xs.
customer_reviews.author: BrainMatter

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Decided to bleach my hair to dye it during the Quaratine. This tub is great and much easier than buying the small lil packets plus reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Neko

customer_reviews.title: don’t let the reviews freak you out
customer_reviews.text: for the girl who get an allergic reaction- don’t ever use 30 developer. you rarely ever have to go up to thirty. get 20 or 10 next time, but this product works fine. it never caused a reaction, bleached my hair perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E Weeks

customer_reviews.title: best powder bleach to use on a budget if youre ...
customer_reviews.text: best powder bleach to use on a budget if youre trying to go blonde fast without severe damage. Love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Darling

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach ever
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it worked amazing on my previous black hair it doesn’t damage the hair as many bleaches my hair was soft and shiny
customer_reviews.author: Christian r.

customer_reviews.title: Works better then anything I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! I use 40 cream developer and drops of red/gold corrector and it easily lifts my medium brown hair to almost white with 1 application. I am currently wearing it white so I did another application a day later and it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. Good size for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Used 30 developer and it turned out great. Put coconut oil in her hair first so it didn't get crusty. Lightened enough on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: ratina ouout

customer_reviews.title: Not full container!!
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up to future customers, the container is not full! I love quick blue and it works great on my dark hair but I seriously thought I was going to be getting this big container of the powder so I wouldn't constantly be making trips to my closest Sally Beauty store (20miles)! A big let down..
customer_reviews.author: Kiana Alzain

customer_reviews.title: Why did it arrive like this?
customer_reviews.text: I got what I asked for, product is perfectly fine it seems. However, it showed up late and the box looked like an absolute mess. Wasn't taped, the front is all ripped up like someone wanted to check if it had anything valuable before dropping it off. They didn't even try to close the box properly. Just open, on my doorstep, looking like someone suddenly got a craving for cardboard. Seriously.. wtf.
customer_reviews.author: Aeris

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach out there!
customer_reviews.text: Always my go to bleach! Works fast and doesn’t fry my hair. Even someone who isn’t as experienced can use this without worry. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Aahz-Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Big bucket - half full
customer_reviews.text: It is a pound like it says, but the bucket would hold 2-3 times that much. Why such a big bucket??
customer_reviews.author: theos

customer_reviews.title: frickn awsome
customer_reviews.text: cheaper then at the local beauty store by far and you get more and NO ISSUES of use at all.. CLICK IF HELP FULL
customer_reviews.author: Bears

customer_reviews.title: Missing creme developer
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be of good quantity with the exception of a creme developer. I’m not sure if the creme is supposed to be purchased separately or not.
customer_reviews.author: elena tsotseva

customer_reviews.title: nope dont get it!
customer_reviews.text: It was the right product but the bucket was big the powder was veery small wjat a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well BUT
customer_reviews.text: But try not to use too high of a developer and I would use coconut oil and Olaplex 1 and 2, if you don't want to wind up with cotton candy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Bleach
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, this product is a must for those of us with very very dark hair. Great product and it came right on time as expected
customer_reviews.author: Merica

customer_reviews.title: Good, packaging was iffy.
customer_reviews.text: Was not quite sealed properly in the package, not happy about loose bleach powder in the box. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimee K.

customer_reviews.title: Bleach
customer_reviews.text: This bleach works well. It lifted my hair sufficiently enough to go into a light ash brown. HOWEVER, like with all bleach products, this bleach also damages hair, and one must be careful when using it. This bleach is the better of some that I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sinai Castro

customer_reviews.text: she is STRONG but in a good way also be careful it might fry your hair off and it smells as strong as it is
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I used this bleach in combination with the suggested developer (I can't remember the brand) and it worked like a charm. My hair bleached faster than it ever has before and my pre-dyed hair started bleaching away while I was applying it. I'm very pleased. My hair is also in fantastic condition and not damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the salon care 30 vol developer!! Only had to bleach virgin hair once with a few touch ups a second time but that was my fault!!
customer_reviews.author: Bana

customer_reviews.title: Rlly effective bleach on virgin hair
customer_reviews.text: This bleach lifts so well in virgin black hair it’s great. The packaging is rlly convenient and it comes with a scoop so I don’t even need to figure out the ratio. I’ve repurchased this alrdy!
customer_reviews.author: Malfoy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional, but it did work well for bleaching. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Quick Blue Powder Bleach, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:16 OunceLoreal Quick Blue Powder Bleach Extra Strength, Lifts Up to Seven Levels and will achieve various effects, from the very subtle highlights all the way to global sheerest platinum, in one simple application. Quick, controlled Lightening action in a dust-free, concentrated formula. Now for ON & OFF scalp application. Stays moist and creamy throughout application and processing, so there is no remixing needed during application.
feature_bullets: Delivers Faster and Brighter Superior Lightening Powder.
Extra Strength Lightening Action Lifts Up To 7 Levels.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,040 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
